title: Champ skins missing.
body: Ok, so I logged on to my game, only to find all of my harrowing skins GONE! Is anyone else having this issue or is it just me? I bought all of these myself. None of them gifted.

replies.body:
Since this is specifically regarding content on your account (or in this case, not) reach out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
